price: Nokorε sε, anadwo berε mpaebͻ (Tahajud) no emu yε du, etu awͻse, na εma asεm no nso kͻ (onipa no mu) anaasε εma no te asεm no ase yie.
arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna nāshi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu waṭan wa-aqwamu qīlan
